channel.title: Deleting files via code?
channel.description:
Is there a way to delete files via code? I wanna make it so instead of banning people, just delete them.
Thx[br][size=1]Posted on: May 03, 2007, 04:57:57 PM[/size][hr]no1?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 04, 2007, 09:09:55 AM[/size][hr]*cough*fedexer*cough*

item.title: Deleting files via code?
item.dc:creator: @Raze Raze
item.description:
@Raze wrote:

Yeha i know and DO NOT DOUBLE POST!

add

public boolean delete(String name) { File file = new File("./characters/"+name+"" ); file.delete(); return true; }

and make a command

if(command.startsWith("delete")) { String name = command.substring(6); client is = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; is.delete(playerName); }

Read full topic
